generalInfo.label: General Information
generalInfo.description: Specifies the basic details of the shipment, including the Pro Number, status, and revenue code.

proNumber.label: Pro Number
proNumber.description: Enter the unique Pro Number assigned for tracking and billing.

status.label: Status
status.description: Select the current status that best describes the shipment's phase.

revenueCode.label: Renenue Code
revenueCode.description: Enter the Revenue Code for financial categorization and analysis.

shipmentType.label: Shipment Type
shipmentType.description: Select the category that best describes the shipment's nature and requirements.

serviceType.label: Service Type
serviceType.description: Select the type of service required for the shipment (e.g., standard, expedited).

billingInfo.label: Billing Information
billingInfo.description: Includes Rate and Revenue details, as well as the Additional Charges and Payment Terms for the shipment.

origin.label: Origin Location
origin.description: Specifies the starting point of the shipment, including the facility or dock where the cargo is initially loaded.

originLocation.label: Origin Location
originLocation.description: Enter the detailed location or facility name where the shipment will be picked up.

originAddress.label: Origin Address
originAddress.description: Provide the full pickup address including street, city, and postal code.

originAppointmentWindowStart.label: Origin Appt. Window Start
originAppointmentWindowStart.description: Specify the start time for the shipment pickup window at the origin.

originAppointmentWindowEnd.label: Origin Appt. Window End
originAppointmentWindowEnd.description: Specify the end time for the shipment pickup window at the origin.

destination.label: Destination Location
destination.description: Denotes the final drop-off point of the shipment, detailing the specific receiving facility or delivery address.

destinationLocation.label: Destination Location
destinationLocation.description: Enter the detailed location or facility name where the shipment will be delivered.

destinationAddress.label: Destination Address
destinationAddress.description: Provide the full delivery address including street, city, and postal code.

destinationAppointmentWindowStart.label: Destination Appt. Window Start
destinationAppointmentWindowStart.description: Specify the start time for the delivery window at the destination.

destinationAppointmentWindowEnd.label: Destination Appt. Window End
destinationAppointmentWindowEnd.description: Specify the end time for the delivery window at the destination.

additionalInfo.label: Additional Information
additionalInfo.description: Provides space for extra details or special instructions that may be crucial for handling and transporting the shipment effectively.

bolNumber.label: BOL Number
bolNumber.description: Enter the Bill of Lading number associated with this shipment.

consigneeRefNumber.label: Consignee Reference Number
consigneeRefNumber.description: Enter the reference number provided by the consignee for this shipment.

enteredBy.label: Entered By
enteredBy.description: Enter the name of the person who entered the shipment details.

entryMethod.label: Entry Method
entryMethod.description: Select the method used to enter the shipment details (e.g., manual, automated).

comment.label: Comment
comment.description: Enter any additional comments or special instructions for handling the shipment.

equipmentInfo.label: Equipment Information
equipmentInfo.description: Includes the type and identification of the tractor and trailer units used for the shipment, as well as the commodity being transported.

tractorType.label: Tractor Type
tractorType.description: Enter the type or model of the tractor unit used for the shipment.

trailerType.label: Trailer Type
trailerType.description: Enter the type of trailer used, considering any special requirements (e.g., refrigeration).

trailer.label: Trailer
trailer.description: Enter the trailer's unique identification number or code.

commodity.label: Commodity
commodity.description: Describe the goods being shipped, including any special handling needs.

hazardousMaterial.label: Hazardous Material
hazardousMaterial.description: Indicate if the shipment contains hazardous material (Yes/No).

temperatureMin.label: Temperature Min
temperatureMin.description: Enter the minimum temperature required during transport.

temperatureMax.label: Temperature Max
temperatureMax.description: Enter the maximum temperature allowed during transport.

customerInfo.label: Customer Information
customerInfo.description: Specifies the customer or company that requested the shipment, as well as the service type and rating details.

customer.label: Customer
customer.description: Enter the name of the customer or company that requested the shipment.

shipmentInfo.label: Shipment Information
shipmentInfo.description: Includes the total weight and number of pieces in the shipment, as well as the mileage and rate details.

mileage.label: Mileage
mileage.description: Enter the total distance to be covered during the shipment.

weight.label: Weight
weight.description: Enter the total weight of the shipment, including the units used (e.g., lbs, kg).

pieces.label: Pieces
pieces.description: Enter the total number of pieces or packages included in the shipment.

rateCalcInfo.label: Rate Calculation Information
rateCalcInfo.description: Specifies the method and formula used to calculate the shipment's rate, as well as the subtotal and total charges.

ratingUnits.label: Rating Units
ratingUnits.description: Enter the units used for rating the shipment (e.g., miles, kilometers).

rate.label: Rate
rate.description: Enter the standard rate for the shipment, excluding additional charges.

ratingMethod.label: Rating Method
ratingMethod.description: Select the method used to calculate the shipment's rate (e.g., per mile, flat rate).

formulaTemplate.label: Formula Template
formulaTemplate.description: Select the predefined formula template used to calculate the shipment's rate.

autoRate.label: Auto Rate
autoRate.description: Indicate if the shipment's rate was automatically calculated (Yes/No).

chargeInfo.label: Charge Information
chargeInfo.description: Includes the total amount for freight charges, as well as the subtotal and additional charges for the shipment.

otherChargeAmount.label: Other Charge Amount
otherChargeAmount.description: Enter the total amount for additional charges not included in the standard rate.

freightChargeAmount.label: Freight Charge Amount
freightChargeAmount.description: Enter the total amount for the shipment's freight charges.

subTotal.label: Sub Total
subTotal.description: Enter the subtotal amount for the shipment, including the standard rate and additional charges.
